entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 02 January 2023
